trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that inherit the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 继承的对象的集合<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider"></xref>抽象类。

trans-unit.source: The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only ProfileProviderCollection through the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开为只读 ProfileProviderCollection 通过<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型，如<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理用户配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许你访问的特定配置文件提供程序不是<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>抽象类</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>的成员的成员

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, empty profile provider collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的空白配置文件提供程序集合。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection> through the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开作为只读<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection>通过<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Adds a profile provider to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将配置文件提供程序添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不应在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: Profile provider instances are added to the `ProfileProviderCollection` for an application using the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) section of the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件提供程序实例添加到`ProfileProviderCollection`为应用程序中使用[元素的提供程序配置文件 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f)配置元素的部分。

trans-unit.source: You can access the profile provider collection using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问配置文件提供程序集合并使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>

trans-unit.source: The profile provider to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的配置文件提供程序。

trans-unit.source: provider is .
trans-unit.target: provideris .

trans-unit.source: provider is not of a type that inherits the abstract class.
trans-unit.target: provider继承的类型不是抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Returns the profile provider referenced by the specified provider name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由指定的提供程序名称引用的配置文件提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The profile providers for an application are exposed as a read-only <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection> through the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> class.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的配置文件提供程序公开作为只读<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection>通过<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager>类。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileManager.Providers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProviderCollection>

trans-unit.source: You can access a specific profile provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 可以按名称访问集合中的特定配置文件提供程序并将其转换为特定的提供程序类型，如<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to manage user profile properties from multiple data stores in a single application.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理用户配置文件属性。

trans-unit.source: It also allows you to access members of a specific profile provider that are not members of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许你访问的特定配置文件提供程序不是<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>抽象类</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider>的成员的成员

trans-unit.source: The name of the profile provider.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件提供程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: An object that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider"></xref> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 继承的对象<xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider"></xref>抽象类。
